title: An Act relative to the prevention of unemployment fraud

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Vaughn of Wrentham, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 2186) of Marcus S. Vaughn for legislation to establish a special commission (including members of the General Court) to study and report on the policies and procedures of the Department of Unemployment Assistance to prevent and address unemployment fraud.  Labor and Workforce Development.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Labor and Workforce Development

related_entities.name: committee on Labor and Workforce Development

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 10/08/2025 from 10:00 AM-5:00 PM in B-1
Hearing rescheduled to 10/08/2025 from 10:00 AM-12:15 PM in B-1                                            and Virtual Hearing updated to New End Time
